forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight approaches Downtown San Francisco, there hangs in the air a gentle mix of clarity and the whispers of an evening breeze. The current conditions are marked by a pleasant partly cloudy sky, with bright patches revealing glimpses of blue, an ideal backdrop for a stroll. As the golden light of dusk casts long shadows, the temperature softly descends to a comfortable mid-fifties, making it sensible to layer up with a light jacket or a cozy sweater. The modest winds from the west-southwest, playful yet steady, dance around at 10 to 15 miles per hour, contributing a refreshing touch as the day bows out.

Looking forward to Thursday, there awaits a promise of mostly sunny skies, an invitation to step out and savor the warmth as the afternoon slowly nudges the high near 67, softening to around 65. Expect that brisk southwest wind to persist, occasionally kicking up with gusts up to 23 miles per hour, adding an invigorating twist to whatever outdoor pursuits one may choose. With such delightful weather on the horizon, consider the charm of a late afternoon visit to a nearby café with an outside seating area or an exploration along the Embarcadero, absorbing the sights and sounds that make this city unmistakably vibrant. As you set out, let the partially veiled sun lead the way, creating a perfect canvas across the Bay.
